title: [LOVE] Ep 75. How to Find True Love w/ Christine Hassler
description:
Have you ever heard or realized you keep dating someone just like your mom or dad?

This week Ash sits down with Christine Hassler to discuss overcoming blocks and how to find true love.  Christine is a master coach who blends spiritual psychology and intuition into her work as a best-selling author, keynote speaker and host of the show Over It and On With It.

We all experience concerns about safety in our daily life and relationships.  Christine walks through one actionable step you can do take any moment to help you feel safe and some key indicators that a person or situation is not safe.  Narcissists are major drivers for instability,  Christine and Ash share key signs that you might be dating a narcissist and how to recover.

Many people end up dating someone just like their parents.  Learn why you do this, what your core wounds are and ways to make changes to build better relationships.  Christine walks through three main core wounds you may experience and specific methods to move through them.  Don’t forget to stick around for the post-episode notes with Ash!

 

In This Episode, You’ll Learn:

  1. Different ways that control shows up in your life and why they are there.
  2. How relationships with your parents impact your love life.
  3. Tools to create self-acceptance.
  4. What level of spark you want to feel with a partner.

 

Where To Find Christine Hassler:

christinehassler.com/mastery

Instagram: @christinehassler

Podcast: Over It and On With It
